title: Cute, sexy, sweet, funny
description: Why are babies cute? Why is cake sweet? Philosopher Dan Dennett has answers you wouldn't expect, as he shares evolution's counterintuitive reasoning on cute, sweet and sexy things (plus a new theory from Matthew Hurley on why jokes are funny).
author: Dan Dennett
keywords: TED, talks, animals, biology, children, comedy, evolution, food, humanity, humor, primates, sex
